name: UNiagaraDataInterfaceAsyncGpuTrace
doc: Data interface for handling latent (delayed 1 frame) traces against the scene for GPU simulations.

MaxTracesPerParticle:
The maximum number of traces (per particle) that can be created per frame.  Defines the size of the preallocated
              buffer that is used to contain the traces.
MaxRetraces: If a collision is rejected, how many times do we attempt to retrace from that collision point forward to find a new, valid collision.
TraceProvider: Defines which technique is used to resolve the trace - see 'AsyncGpuTraceDI/Provider Priority' in the Niagara project settings.
